description:
PerchI remember the first time I saw Seven. It was many years ago in a bondage video entitled "Puke", the content of which included a scene of her bound bent over with a large ring gag locking her mouth open. A man methodically gets her to vomit by jamming a dildo down her throat then left her to hang there with tears, vomit, snot and drool mixing together as they dripped from her face to the floor below.
So, when I saw her picture listed in the company model database, I booked her.
title: Perch
